column3: @TheBlueMatt Comments on how this should interact with #9014? Perhaps we want to keep the ConnectTrace struct there, but with just blocksConnected in it, or remove the struct entirely?
I'd prefer to keep the ConnectTrace in #9014 as it might make fixing #9027 easier later. One will have to be rebased on the other, though...
dance dance dance on the grave of main.cpp

There was discussion about this change in IRC: https://botbot.me/freenode/bitcoin-core-dev/2016-12-14/?msg=77971517&page=2.\n\nSummary: #9240 caused an unintended change where "-walletnotify isn't fired on transactions that were in the mempool and then evicted due to a tx in a new block conflicting them." One response might be to revert #9240, another response might be to add new calls to SyncTr
This changes the `fCurrentEstimate` parameter value from false to true. Intentional?
Yeah, there was no reason for that to be set.  It's only for fee estimates which are useless in this test.
Should we also get rid of the `ConnectTrace` struct?
@TheBlueMatt was in favor of keeping it for now.  I have no objection.
